author: @parameshreddy95

text:
Bought Xoom top model a year ago baat ye h ki gaddi chalane ka maza to petrol me hi aata h 10200 me saare accesories aa gyi including guards 
Build quality bhi mast h 
If I am paying extra 63k what should I expect?
I should expect a good ride quality with no issues but electric vehicles lack that like how can you even travel 200 km trip with ev?
63000/100=630 
And lets assume mileage to be 50 then we can easily ride for 31k km 
Also remember that if the tyre gets punctured no local machanic will even touch the ev 
There may be many benifits if you see from the outside but the reality is very different 
I bought an ev 2 years ago and its battery got detoriated in 1 year and the company asked to pay me 35k for battery replacement That's why I shifted to petrol 
Ev is a great optiyfor future but not for now there is no infrastructure for long rides

author: @bachanmarndi2243

text:
Bhavish Aggarwal  announced a Republic Day offer for the Ola S1 Pro at an ex-showroom price of Rs 129,990, and within three days, he reduced it by Rs 15,000. Imagine the plight of those who bought it on Republic Day!
He immediately launched the 3rd Gen vehicles. I paid Rs 8,625 as a down payment for the 2nd gen vehicle, but they are not allowing me to upgrade to the 3rd gen vehicle or apply the reduced price to my purchase. They are asking me to pay the higher amount that was initially announced! Their money is valuable, but ours is not! Don't support such a person.
The Ola app shows one delivery date, but after paying the money, they keep extending it. When asked at the showroom, they give vague answers. This person who makes so many false promises talks about rules. All those rules are designed to benefit him. Where is customer satisfaction?

text:
Hmm I own Ritza top model don't expect 125km max to max you will get 80km due to discharge of battery is huge even not used. This is because of gps and other stats to sync to your mobile app.
Every 3 hr ideal condition will loose 1km. Many positives are in shade due to drop in charge.
Pros
1: Seating 
2: Auto hold
3: Skid control
4: Twist break
Cons
1:Low range
2: Battery drop on ideal condition 1km drop every 3hr ideal condition.

Just after using one month my Ritza horn did not work and they replaced with new, now signal sound gone have to go for repair.
